text: Libyan Institute for Advanced Studies (مجمع ليبيا للدراسات المتقدمة) or (LIAS) is a private research, advisory, and education institution. The Libyan Institute for Advanced Studies has campuses in Tripoli, Bayda, and Tobruk, Libya.http://lias.ly/en/main/About The Libyan Institute for Advanced Studies is led by Chairman Dr. Aref Ali Nayed.http://lias.ly/en/main/About/welcome- chairman ==References== Category:Educational organizations based in Libya
title: Libyan Institute for Advanced Studies
